description: A newly discovered vulnerability in Phoenix SecureCore UEFI firmware tracked as CVE-2024-0762 impacts devices running numerous Intel CPUs, with Lenovo already releasing new firmware updates to resolve the flaw. [...]
title: Phoenix UEFI vulnerability impacts hundreds of Intel PC models

description: A vulnerability dubbed "CosmicSting" impacting Adobe Commerce and Magento websites remains largely unpatched nine days after the security update has been made available, leaving millions of sites open to catastrophic attacks. [...]
title: CosmicSting flaw impacts 75% of Adobe Commerce, Magento sites

description: The RansomHub ransomware operation is using a Linux encryptor designed specifically to encrypt VMware ESXi environments in corporate attacks. [...]
title: Linux version of RansomHub ransomware targets VMware ESXi VMs

description: A suspected Chinese threat actor tracked as UNC3886 uses publicly available open-source rootkits named 'Reptile' and 'Medusa' to remain hidden on VMware ESXi virtual machines, allowing them to conduct credential theft, command execution, and lateral movement. [...]
title: UNC3886 hackers use Linux rootkits to hide on VMware ESXi VMs

description: Threat actors are actively exploiting a SolarWinds Serv-U path-traversal vulnerability, leveraging publicly available proof-of-concept (PoC) exploits. [...]
title: SolarWinds Serv-U path-traversal flaw actively exploited in attacks

description: Car dealership SaaS platform CDK Global suffered an additional breach Wednesday night as it was starting to restore systems shut down in an previous cyberattack. [...]
title: CDK Global hacked again while recovering from first cyberattack

description: T-Mobile has denied it was breached or that source code was stolen after a threat actor claimed to be selling stolen data from the telecommunications company. [...]
title: T-Mobile denies it was hacked, links leaked data to vendor breach
